readable.title: 542179694_e170e9e465
readable.content: A firetruck stops and makes a call at a bridge , where a man and his dogs are running . A firetruck with ladder extended on the side of the road . A jogger with a dog approaches a ladder truck . A jogger with a dog running towards a firetruck with extended ladder on a road A man walks on a sidewalk and a firetruck is nearby .
